channel.title: Tutorials on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing

item.title: Tutorials and videos
item.description: Here’s a short list of video tutorials produced by community members. If you’d like yours added to the list please contact us! FlyMine intro videos - for the Drosophila-minded among us. Thalemine tutorials - A. thaliana-based tutorials. TargetMine tutorials Tutorials for an InterMine designed to help identify drug targets. YeastMine videos - SGD has quite a broad range of tutorials based on S. Cerevisiae data. MouseMine at MGI - M.
